definition: to be effective over an extended period

sentences.english: Yet, right now, we have new, long-lasting insecticidal mosquito nets.
sentences.chinese: 但是，現在我們有新的長效殺蟲劑蚊帳。

sentences.english: Occupation safety and health management system and the long-term mechanism of work safety must be set up.
sentences.chinese: 建立職業安全健康管理體系，建立安全生產長效機制。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a long-acting emulsion-type antirust fluid used for metal rust prevention.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及用於金屬防鏽的長效乳化型防鏽液。

sentences.english: The main component of sustained effect riboflavin injection is riboflavin laurate.
sentences.chinese: 長效核黃素注射液的主要成分是核黃素月桂酸酯。

sentences.english: As a long-term decorative topcoat on the surface of high buildings.
sentences.chinese: 作爲長效裝飾面漆，塗覆在高層建築的外表面。

sentences.english: Secondly, should focus on building a long-term protection of the right to know potential buyer integrated mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 其次，應着力構建預購人知情權保護的長效綜合機制。

sentences.english: Alternatively sows can be injected with long-acting penicillin at point of farrowing.
sentences.chinese: 或者，可以在分娩時給母豬注射長效青黴素。

sentences.english: Gradually form a long-term mechanism to ensure the key university students in rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 逐步形成保障農村學生上重點高校的長效機制。

sentences.english: We have been to technological innovation as it is to maintain a long-term driving force for enterprise development.
sentences.chinese: 我們一直把技術創新作爲是維繫企業發展的長效動力。

sentences.english: The third is to establish long-term management mechanism, and promote team-building for protracted.
sentences.chinese: 三是要建立長效管理機制，推動班組建設持久開展。

sentences.english: Endogenous effect mechanism of rural nonpoint pollution control are lack both in domestic and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 國內外農村面源污染控制都缺乏內源的長效運行機制。

sentences.english: Only in this way can the final target of the long term solution be achieved to the prblems of overload and oversize transportation.
sentences.chinese: 惟此才能實現公路超限超載長效治理的最終目標。

sentences.english: Establishing the long-acting mechanism for the network information is the primary task of the current library work.
sentences.chinese: 建立網絡信息長效機制是當前圖書館工作的首要任務。

sentences.english: Borage Therapy delivers long lasting benefits directly to skin cells.
sentences.chinese: 琉璃苣療法帶來直接進入皮膚細胞長效的作用。

sentences.english: White protective layer formation, long-term protection of the teeth, reduce plaque regeneration.
sentences.chinese: 形成亮白保護層，長效的保護牙齒，減緩牙石再生。

sentences.english: Can long-term stand agaist the damage to skim from ultraviolet radiation.
sentences.chinese: 能長效抵抗紫外線對肌膚的傷害如何翻譯？

definition: to give a more granular level of detail/to elaborate/to refine/to become more differentiated
lit. set up a pole and see the shadow (idiom); fig. instant effect/quick results
to treat only the symptoms but not the root cause
